CustomField.description: For sales operation, SLA for deal reg review is 72 hours. We are sending a reminder to sales operation 10 hours before the 72 hours(means after 62 hours from the deal reg submission date & time). Weekends are excluded in this 72 hours.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For sales operation, SLA for deal reg review is 72 hours. We are sending a reminder to sales operation 10 hours before the 72 hours(means after 62 hours from the deal reg submission date & time). Weekends are excluded in this 72 hours.
CustomField.label: Sales Operation Reminder Date & Time
